pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This ebuild fork adds patches necessary to make jemalloc it work with openusd package and changes necessary to avoid merge conflicts with the jemalloc package.
It was decided to keep this one with -mtls-dialect=gnu2 separate from the original to avoid possible complications or avoid introducing new bugs systemwide.
With pgo and epgo USE flags disabled, 12 functions are manually expanded or shrunk. Details can be found in commit a9fa2defdbe98b849151688cb70e24ba55dc8587 .

use.flag: Perform 3 step BOLT optimization in one emerge. (EXPERIMENTAL/TESTING)
Allow to override upstream optimization flags
Perform 1 step BOLT optimization in one emerge with training done passively. (EXPERIMENTAL/TESTING)

Perform 1 step PGO optimization in one emerge. with training done passively.
If USE pgo or epgo is disabled, it will fall back to manual hot and cold function marking.
If USE pgo or epgo is enabled, it will override and replace the manual hot and cold function marking with automatic detection.

Perform 3 step PGO optimization in one emerge.
If USE pgo or epgo is disabled, it will fall back to manual hot and cold function marking.
If USE pgo or epgo is enabled, it will override and replace the manual hot and cold function marking with automatic detection.
Enable lazy locking (only lock when multi-threaded)
Use the stress test as the PGO trainer.
Use the test suite as the PGO trainer.
